{2. NEW BOLSOVER PRIMARY SCHOOL
{ 1907}- Opened as New Bolsover Public Elementary (Infant) School. There was also a school nearby which had opened in{1894}as the Bolsover Colliery Company School. The headmaster of the Colliery School was appointed before the completion of the building in 1894. The school wasn't opened until November 1894 so that the teachers could canvas the colliery village to find out how many children would be attending the new school. { 1939}- Colliery School closed { 1939}- Infant School became New Bolsover Primary { 1946}- Two rooms needed at the old school { 1969}- Colliery school again closed
